}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{disablePadding:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItemButton,{selected:location.pathname===item.path,onClick:()=>navigate(item.path),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemIcon,{children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:item.text})]})},item.text))})]});};export default Sidebar;
